website_summaries.verdict: Large display screen for a laptop at 17.3-inches. Offered at a good price.
pros: Great option to have a 17.3-inch display screen at this price point
Plenty of storage space with a 1 TB hard drive and 128 GB SSD
Ships with a high-end Intel CPU and a powerful graphics card, all of which is perfect for gaming with this laptop
cons: Some may want to have a 4K resolution display screen at this price point

customer_reviews.title: Wicked Fast
customer_reviews.text: So I'm not sure what the other reviewer is talking about, this did come with 128gb SSD and 1 TB Baracudda drive. I replaced the drives with a 1TB NVMe Drive and 2TB Firecuda extra drive and dropped in 32GB Ram. This things well packaged, gorgeous, black brushed metal, and wicked fast. Everything just worked, booted right up after upgrades and nothing stops it with instant loads. My last HP was an HP Envy and it was also remarkably well built so I stepped up to Omen.
customer_reviews.author: real yt? good like awesome

customer_reviews.title: Roughed Up Box but Happy Graduate
customer_reviews.text: The small sheet of brown paper in the box is all that was used for packaging. Fortunately, computer manufacturers pack their items very well. You would think spending $1100 on something meant you could get at least a little bubble wrap or a couple of air packs. The laptop itself is fine, thank goodness. The size, graphics, memory is everything my son wanted/needed to start his music production/engineering career. The screen and sound quality are virtually perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dana S. Ballard

customer_reviews.title: My Grandson's gaming computer
customer_reviews.text: On advice of friends, I gave this to my Grandson for Christmas. I guess he likes it, never see him anymore, "he's in his bedroom on hs computer.
customer_reviews.author: lifeisgood

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: So far love it. I had a desktop that was so slow it was agonising. Despite being new. I could not do the things I enjoy like minecraft or skype with family. Normal browsing of the web was at a snails pace. So I splurged on a pricer item after reviewing lots of models. Now, everything is quick and easy, with great quality, graphics and sound. Anyone experiencing different either has too high standards, is unrealistic, super rich to find a thousand dollar laptop 'lower end', or got a fluke dodgy one. Maybe some were buying used. Mine is new. This works great.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Despite some inconveniences at the begining of the process it arrived in perfect state and just in time
customer_reviews.author: Matias Dabo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Computer
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy this for gaming, but to replace a sluggish laptop used to run CAD/CAM software. This laptop was a nice upgrade and runs our software without any hiccups. Nice screen and fast at a great price. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Baumach

customer_reviews.title: 1 year Review
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this computer last Christmas for my son. He says it still performs excellent. He absolutely loves this computer and says he has no complaints. I paid about 1100.00 for this which was about 400 less than Best Buy and other home shopping channels. So we were extremely happy about that. I can say after one year this computer is still performing well.
customer_reviews.author: Chelley

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard cannot be used with trackpad!
customer_reviews.text: Not a good investment for a 1050. What sucks is that Amazon only offered this high priced laptop for a monthly payment option. I needed a laptop quick though with college happening, as my last one decided to bite the dust. Runs good and no issues yet. Can play medium/high graphics- depending on game. Keyboard cannot be used with trackpad when playing games!!! This was a big dent in stars for me. What’s the point I’m having a portable rig, if you have to hookup external hardware to use properly? Good for Diablo games and other ones like it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: bad ass
customer_reviews.text: shipping and packing was great. For the price with free shipping and the specs on this laptop very good deal.
customer_reviews.author: rue rue

customer_reviews.title: I don't know what's wrong with this, but screen stopped somtimes
customer_reviews.text: Not only once. Screen looks like jammed when it lagged, and it happens every 15 min. I installed windows again, clean up the drive, but it never works. Also some of windows key(for example: Window key+TAB) never works either. Don't buy this. My last one was ASUS, but that one was better.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.text: More powerful than you might think just looking at the specs alone. Upgrade the RAM when you can and this laptop will soar.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Justice

customer_reviews.title: Fast
customer_reviews.text: Suoer fast large screen get FPS and playing everything on max ultra setting no lag.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Donner

customer_reviews.title: Good computer but not a lot of memory
customer_reviews.text: It's a great computer and it runs really well but there is such little memory on it that I always have to delete things to make room. But other than the memory it's great, I game and record, and stream on it and haven't run into any problems yet.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Killer laptop
customer_reviews.text: This laptop has everything I needed, it's fast, the screen is clear, the keys are great, and it handles the programs I need.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: HP
customer_reviews.text: Always a reliable product, 10 yrs of service is not unusual.
customer_reviews.author: neilsok001

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful machine
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband and he loves it. The only complaint is that it required a bunch of updating before he could actually use it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolinagal67

customer_reviews.title: Very Good For The Money
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike, very high quality computer. Received on time and great packaging. No problems!
customer_reviews.author: Perryn

customer_reviews.title: A very good computer
customer_reviews.text: This is the first gaming computer that i have purchased and it has lived up to its reviews. I have had no problems with it's operation.
customer_reviews.author: Donald W Haberkamp

customer_reviews.title: the speakers suck
customer_reviews.text: seriously, for this money, the bang and crap name, I really expected punching sound. there are no speakers, so bad.
customer_reviews.author: divediveanddive

customer_reviews.title: awesome laptop
customer_reviews.text: great laptop for gaming and animation. it runs really well ans games look awesome on it, just really bulky
customer_reviews.author: Michel

customer_reviews.title: OS not found
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for less than 6 months and occasionally get an error message with a black screen that it cannot find the operating system and have to shut down and restart. I expect for the kind of money that I spent on this machine that it would perform better than this.
customer_reviews.author: BigR

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is perfect for someone who is not trying to break the bank but still wants a quality laptop. The dual drive allows me to have a super fast OS while still having a full TB for storage. As a college student, this literally gives me the best of both worlds.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and he loves it. My little cousin is a casual gamer but said this computer is fast and I like the look of it.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne

customer_reviews.title: Speed, reliability
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop, in use it for trading and it easily keeps up with the work load.
customer_reviews.author: Findley Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Super laptop
customer_reviews.text: I really like my Omen laptop. I run FSX and can now max out the graphics and it runs seamlessly. It's quiet, does not overheat and is quick. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: C. Culver

customer_reviews.title: Omen by HP
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good. Only that other HP adapters that I was using in HP Envy does not seem to work with it. Needs a higher capacity adapter. Overall I like what I got
customer_reviews.author: Emeka S. Obe

customer_reviews.title: Great product great value
customer_reviews.text: After two rotten returns to Best Buy, my son opted to order his gaming laptop from amazon. It was a Christmas present. Now as we reach the end of July, it is still working. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: really nice and amazing laptop.
customer_reviews.text: awesome computer though I already need to up my ram so can design with my adobe programs and it not freeze up. the description lies though. you can not get 4.1 on the processor due to hp blocking the overclock feature and can only set refresh rate to max of 60 not 120.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Over priced and slow
customer_reviews.text: A slow and utterly over priced paper weight. Save your money and stay away from hp garbage.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: garbage PC
customer_reviews.text: can't even edit in 1080p I don't know what it's good for. Maybe for playing cod6 but other than that it's useless, it's better off being tossed in a trash can.
customer_reviews.author: a991103

customer_reviews.title: This is not what I expected to surprise my husband with.
customer_reviews.text: This does not have 1 TB of memory as advertised!!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Padgett

product_meta.title: Omen by HP 17-Inch Gaming Laptop, Intel Core i7-8750H Processor, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4 GB, 12 GB RAM, 1 TB Hard Drive and 128 GB SSD, Windows 10 Home (17-an110nr, Black)
product_meta.description: Equipped with powerful hardware and an aggressive design, the OMEN gaming Laptop pc takes mobile performance seriously, letting you conquer any challenge in-game from just about anywhere.
feature_bullets: Processor: 8th Generation intel(r) core(tm) i7-8750H Processor, 6-Core, 2.2GHz up to 4.1GHz.
Video Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti (4 GB GDDR5 dedicated).
Display: 17.3-Inch diagonal Full HD IPS Anti-Glare WLED-backlit (1920 x 1080) with 120Hz refresh rate.
Memory: 12 GB DDR4-2666 SDRAM (upgradable with 2 accessible Memory Slots).
Hard Drive and solid-state drive: 1 TB 7200 RPM SATA hard drive + 128 GB PCIe NVMe M.2 Solid State Drive.
Battery life: up to 12 hours and 15 minutes (mixed usage); up to 8 hours and 30 minutes (video playback); up to 6 hours and 45 minutes (wireless streaming).
Dimensions AND weight (unpackaged): 16.65 inches (W) x 11.97 inches (D) x 1.30 inch (H); 8.33 pounds.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars81 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
